mapper.select: SELECT CU.CMPNY_USER_ID, CU.CMPNY_ID , CU.USER_TYPE_CD, CU.USER_NM , CU.LOGIN_ID, CU.PWD , C.CMPNY_TYPE_CD, C.CMPNY_NM , CU.STAT_CD, CU.JOIN_DT , CU.DEPT_NM, CU.POSI_NM , CU.TEL_NO, CU.FAX_NO, CU.HP_NO, CU.EMAIL , CU.REG_DTS, CU.REGPE_ID , CU.MOD_DTS, CU.MODPE_ID FROM CMPNY_USER CU LEFT OUTER JOIN CMPNY C ON CU.CMPNY_ID = C.CMPNY_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CU.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
